pages.text: 26|84|Va ʙarojam dar ojandagon ovozai nek qaror ʙideh
26|85|Va maro az vorisoni ʙihisti purne'mat ʙigardon
26|86|Va padaramro ʙijomurz, [ki] ʙe tardid, dar zumrai gumrohon ʙud
26|87|Va ruze, ki [mardum] ʙarangexta mesavand, maro rasvo [va sarmanda] nasoz
26|88|Hamon ruze, ki molu farzandon sude nameʙaxsand
26|89|Magar kase, ki ʙo qalʙi pok [va xoli az sirku nifoq va rijo] ʙa pesgohi Alloh taolo ʙijojad»
26|90|Va [on ruz] ʙihist ʙaroi parhezkoron nazdik megardad
26|91|Va duzax ʙaroi gumrohon oskor mesavad
26|92|Va ʙa onon gufta mesavad: «On ci ʙa coi Alloh taolo meparastided, [aknun] kuco hastand
26|93|Ojo [onho dar ʙaroʙari azoʙi ilohi] joriaton mekunand jo [hatto xud]-ro jori medihand?»
26|94|Pas, onho [ʙutho] hamrohi gumrohon dar on [otasi havlangez] afkanda mesavand
26|95|Va [hamrohi] tamomi laskarijoni Iʙlis
26|96|Dar on co [musrikon] dar holi sitez [ʙo ma'ʙudoni ʙotil] megujand
26|97|«Ba Alloh taolo savgand, ki mo dar gumrohii oskore ʙudem»
26|98|On goh ki sumoro ʙo Parvardigori cahonijon ʙaroʙar medonistem
26|99|Va moro kase cuz mucrimon gumroh nakard
26|100|Pas, [aknun] na hec safoatgare dorem
26|101|Va na hec dusti mehruʙone
26|102|Pas, kos ʙozgaste [ʙa dunjo] dostem va dar zumrai mu'minon qaror megiriftem»
26|103|Hatman, dar in [mocaro] nisonae [ʙaroi iʙrat giriftan] ast, vale ʙestarason mu'min naʙudand
26|104|Va ʙe tardid, Parvardigorat hamon sikastnopaziri mehruʙon ast
26|105|Qavmi Nuh pajomʙaronro duruƣgu angostand
26|106|On goh ki ʙarodarason Nuh ʙa onon guft: «Ojo [az Alloh taolo] parvo namekuned?»
26|107|Ba rosti, man ʙaroi sumo pajomʙari amin hastam
26|108|Pas, az Alloh taolo parvo kuned va mutei [dasturhoi] man ʙosed
26|109|Va man [dar ʙaroʙari risolatam] hec podose az sumo namexoham. Podosi man tanho ʙar [uhdai] Parvardigori cahonijon ast
26|110|Pas, az Alloh taolo parvo kuned va mutei [dasturhoi] man ʙosed»
26|111|Onon guftand: «Ojo ʙa tu imon ʙijovarem, dar hole ki [faqat] furumojagon] az tu pajravi kardaand?»
